value_claims.claim_title: Arup developed Face Check using Azure AI Services for biometric security
value_claims.claim_description: Arup Group utilized Microsoft Entra Verified ID and Azure AI Services to develop Face Check, enabling employees to register photos for high-confidence biometric assurance in remote or face-to-face transactions, deepening defense and security layers.
value_claims.source_quote: Arup Group utilized Microsoft Entra Verified ID, and other security solutions to develop Face Check, powered by Azure AI Services. Employees register a photo to maintain high-confidence biometric assurance for quality and audit purposes.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Azure AI Services directly powers the Face Check solution, providing the biometric assurance capability.

context_claims.claim_title: Arup operates in architecture and engineering sector
context_claims.claim_description: Arup Group is identified as operating within the architecture and engineering industry.
context_claims.source_quote: Architecture and engineering - Arup Group utilized Microsoft Entra Verified ID

context_claims.claim_title: Arup aims to deepen defense and security layers
context_claims.claim_description: The Face Check solution was developed to deepen layers of defense and security for quality and audit purposes in both remote and face-to-face transactions.
context_claims.source_quote: to maintain high-confidence biometric assurance for quality and audit purposes, whether it's a remote or face-to-face transaction, to deepen their layers of defense and security.

context_claims.claim_title: Face Check supports security and identity verification functions
context_claims.claim_description: The Face Check solution provides biometric identity verification for employees to support security, quality assurance, and audit processes.
context_claims.source_quote: Employees register a photo to maintain high-confidence biometric assurance for quality and audit purposes

context_claims.claim_title: Face Check is a biometric security solution
context_claims.claim_description: Face Check is a security product that uses biometric photo registration powered by Azure AI Services to provide identity assurance.
context_claims.source_quote: Arup Group utilized Microsoft Entra Verified ID, and other security solutions to develop Face Check, powered by Azure AI Services.

context_claims.claim_title: Deepfake fraud poses significant threat to financial services
context_claims.claim_description: Financial services sector faces escalating deepfake fraud with $900M in losses since 2019, $410M in H1 2025 alone, and 780% increase in incidents in European financial sector.
context_claims.source_quote: losses linked to deepfake-enabled scams have reached almost $900 million since 2019. In the first half of 2025 alone, financial institutions lost $410 million

context_claims.claim_description: Arup was victim of deepfake fraud where employee was duped during video conference with deepfakes of CFO and other employees, resulting in 15 transactions totaling HK$200M (USD$25M+) to five Hong Kong bank accounts.
context_claims.source_quote: The British engineering company Arup was the victim of a deepfake fraud at the beginning of 2024, which resulted in a total loss of over USD $25M.

context_claims.claim_title: Arup deepfake fraud occurred in early 2024
context_claims.claim_description: The deepfake fraud incident at Arup took place at the beginning of 2024.
context_claims.source_quote: The British engineering company Arup was the victim of a deepfake fraud at the beginning of 2024
